name: Princess & Conquest
description:
Princess & Conquest is a hybrid RPG game where you, the Knight, will have to decide the fortunes of a Kingdom, plunged into chaos after a certain "incident"!
The sudden disappearance of a powerful dragon is the spring for a series of events that will plunge the whole Kingdom into chaos!
Key features:
VN meets RPG meets Strategy in a world to travel on foot, boat, digging your way underground, diving or flying with wings on your back
More than 100k possible looks for NPCs you can recruit and "have fun" with
Beatiful CGs and pixel animations made by professionals
Countless dialogues, scenes, events exploring the Kingdom's characters and its story
Unique mechanics (simulated pregnancies and genetics, breeding, slave auctions, necromancy, kingdom-wide corruption, transformations...)
Constant updates
All the characters depicted in this game are age 18+.
